name: Insert Vital Signs after saving Patient Appointment
script:
if doc.appointment_date == frappe.utils.nowdate():
    frappe.get_doc(dict(
        doctype = 'Vital Signs',
        patient = doc.patient,
        signs_date = frappe.utils.nowdate(),
        signs_time = frappe.utils.nowtime(),
        appointment = doc.name,
        custom_branch = frappe.db.get_value('Healthcare Service Unit', doc.service_unit, 'custom_branch'),
        vital_signs_note = doc.notes)).insert();

name: Set Branch in Healthcare Service Unit
script:
if doc.is_group == 1 and doc.parent_healthcare_service_unit:
    doc.custom_branch = frappe.db.get_value('Healthcare Service Unit', doc.parent_healthcare_service_unit, 'custom_branch')

name: Insert Queue Pooling after Vital Sign Submit
script:
if doc.signs_date == frappe.utils.nowdate():
    frappe.get_doc(dict(
        doctype = 'Queue Pooling',
        vital_sign = doc.name,
        patient = doc.patient,
        date = frappe.utils.nowdate(),
        status = 'Queued',
        appointment = doc.appointment,
        company = doc.company,
        branch = doc.custom_branch,
        service_unit = frappe.db.get_value('Patient Appoinment', doc.appointment, 'service_unit'),
        note = doc.vital_signs_note)).insert();

name: Set Queue Pooling Status after Saving Encounter
script:
if doc.custom_queue_pooling:
    qp = frappe.get_doc("Queue Pooling", doc.custom_queue_pooling)
    qp.status = "Ongoing"
    qp.dequeue_time = frappe.utils.nowtime()
    qp.encounter = doc.name
    qp.healthcare_practitioner = doc.practitioner
    qp.save()

name: Timeout Queue Pooling
script:
queue_pooling = frappe.db.get_list('Queue Pooling', filters={'status': 'Queued'}, fields=['name', 'date'])
for q in queue_pooling:
    if q['date']!=frappe.utils.today():
        doc = frappe.get_doc('Queue Pooling', q['name'])
        doc.status = 'Cancelled'
        doc.cancel_reason = 'Timeout'
        doc.save()

name: Set No Show
Set Cancelled on Open Appointments
Unlink Queue Pooling before Delete
script:
if doc.custom_queue_pooling:
    qp = frappe.get_doc("Queue Pooling", doc.custom_queue_pooling)
    qp.status = "Queued"
    qp.dequeue_time = None
    qp.encounter = None
    qp.healthcare_practitioner = None
    qp.save()
